attributes.action: Reduce the practical motorcycle test fees to be in line with the car test
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The motorcycle test fees will rise to an all time high of £96 this year according to the DSA. When the car test is only £56 this is both imbalanced and unfair. 
I personally see this as yet another level of discrimination from the Driving Standards Agency, it is obvious that they want less motorcyclists to pass or even take the test.
More bikes will make car drivers more aware of bikes and therefore can only add to road safety. More cars on the road just increases congestion, pollution and bad driving attitudes from people driving motorised wheel chairs. Please sign this petition and ask the governement to review and reduce the Test fees fro the practical motorcycle test.
